PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-13902013-12-12JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Gregory Ellies ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
PrecisOrder authorizing additional reimbursement periods for the Hon. GREGORY ELLIES, a judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, further to his relocation from Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario to North Bay, Ontario for (1) cost of maintaining his former residence for the period from April 11, 2013 to October 10, 2013; and (2) from May 20, 2013, to November 19, 2013, the period during which the difference the sale price of the former residence and its fair market value could be reimbursed to the Hon. M. GREGORY ELLIES.
AttachmentsAttachment
